description: Shared Services Canada (SSC) has a requirement for the provision of EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC – DND Temporary Workload Migration Project.
full_summary:
**EMC Software Maintenance and Support for SSC - DND Temporary Workload Migration Project**
=============================================

**Tender Announcement**
------------------------

The Government of Canada, represented by Shared Services Canada (SSC), has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of EMC Software Maintenance and Support for the SSC - DND Temporary Workload Migration Project.

**bidNoticeInformation**
-------------------------

*   Tender Reference Number: SSC-23-00022251:T
*   Solicitation Number: BPM018479/22251
*   Tender Closing Date: March 17, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST (Eastern Standard Time)
*   Notice URL: Not available
*   Attachments: [Link to download attachments](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/F5773508-C68F-43AA-AF7B-88AB41F3E0EE) and (https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/17B5FE26-B14B-4F59-8833-26BDFACE6E2C)

**Contract Information**
-----------------------

*   Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
*   Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada
*   End User Entities: Shared Services Canada
*   Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K0A 0C3, Canada
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Eric Lavigne
    *   Email: [eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:eric.lavigne@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
    *   Phone: 343-541-8756
    *   Fax: 613-960-6026
    *   Address: 180 Kent Ottawa, K1J 4A8, Canada

**Security and Trade Agreements**
-------------------------------

This solicitation contains a security requirement. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTS), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement,
